    • Method Detail

      • canCastleLeft

        public boolean canCastleLeft()
        Sees if the king can castle to the left. Returns true if the king has not moved, there are no pieces in the way, and if the king is in check, moving through check, or into check.

      • canCastleRight

        public boolean canCastleRight()
        Sees if the king can castle to the right. Returns true if the king has not moved, there are no pieces in the way, and if the king is in check, moving through check, or into check.

        public java.util.ArrayList<PossibleTile> getPossibleTiles(Board board)

        Specified by:
        getPossibleTiles in class Piece
        Parameters:
        board - the board that is checked for possible moves
        Returns:
        all of the possible tiles to which this piece can move.
